attacks.name: Poison Horn
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Rolling Thunder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. If tails, this attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
